segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous just watching him; he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, ready to catch any cookies that come her way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to have done this before, working together like a little team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is already tilting; it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit terrifying to watch, but also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they might just pull it off without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
